# Basic programming tools

# If-else statement
if (a > b) {
  print("a is greater than b")
} else {
  print("b is greater than or equal to a")
}

# For loop
for (i in 1:5) {
  print(i)
}

# While loop
x <- 1
while (x <= 5) {
  print(x)
  x <- x + 1
}
